sentences.english: The control of contactor with a new type of permanent magnet actuator is studied in this thesis.
sentences.chinese: 本文对一种新型永磁机构接触器的控制进行了研究。

sentences.english: This paper presents an improved scheme of rotor position estimation for PMSM.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种永磁同步电动机转子位置估算的改进方法。

sentences.english: Flux reversal machine (FRM) is a special doubly salient permanent magnet machine.
sentences.chinese: 磁通反向电机是一种特殊的双凸极永磁电机。

sentences.english: This paper focuses on the theory and measurement of dynamic characteristics of permanent-magnet DC motors.
sentences.chinese: 主要讨论了永磁直流电机的动态特性理论和测量。

sentences.english: This paper presents a field-oriented vector control system for permanent magnet synchronous motor.
sentences.chinese: 本文阐述了永磁同步电动机磁场定向矢量控制系统。

sentences.english: Permancet magnet DC motor, 220V, 50Hz, single phase.
sentences.chinese: 永磁直流电机，220伏，50赫兹，单相。

sentences.english: USES: Used for making metallic samarium, permanent magnetic materials and electronic devices, etc.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了采用钐钴永磁铁的夹具设计方案。

sentences.english: This is widely used for super-strong permanent magnets.
sentences.chinese: 其被广泛用于制造超强永磁体。

sentences.english: This paper designs a DSP-based permanent magnet synchronous motor servo system.
sentences.chinese: 设计了一套基于DSP的永磁同步电机伺服系统。

sentences.english: Nonlinear L2 robust control for bearing less permanent magnet synchronous motors (BPMSM) was presented.
sentences.chinese: 对无轴承永磁同步电动机提出非线性L2鲁棒控制。

sentences.english: This paper discusses the perspective of Nd-Fe-B permanent magnet(PM) in the application to electrical machines.
sentences.chinese: 本文的目的旨在讨论钕铁硼永磁在电机中的应用前景。

sentences.english: These electro-permanent magnetic chucks are also available in long pole design.
sentences.chinese: 这些电永磁吸盘也可以利用长极块设计。

sentences.english: This paper describes the fundamentals of inspecting the wiper permanent magnet motors by the aid of microcomputer.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了刮水器永磁电机微机检测的基本原理。

sentences.english: The radial stiffness of magnetic bearings composed of only two permanent magnet rings is limited.
sentences.chinese: 由双磁环组成的永磁磁悬浮轴承的径向刚度很有限。

sentences.english: Theory of thulium no-brush DC motor will be research.
sentences.chinese: 了解稀土永磁无刷直流电机的工作原理。

sentences.english: Three reversible permanent-magnet motors in one housing provide the various seat movements.
sentences.chinese: 三个永磁电动机为座椅提供不同方向的移动。
